DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to estimate the contribution of abdominal imaging by magnetic resonance Imaging (MRI) and abdominal scanner in the detection of subdiaphragmatic infarction associated to the atrial fibrillation in the cerebral infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of New Diagnostic Methods of Cardio-embolic Related (Atrial Fibrillation) Cerebral Infarction
